name: Tam Dao National Park - Private tour
description: Just 90 km from Hanoi, Tam Dao was created at the beginning of the 20th century by the French as a holiday resort for the wealthy. It is located north west of Hanoi at an elevation of almost 1,200 meters, surrounded by sheer cliffs and jungle. Because of its height above sea level the temperature remains pleasant and comfortable year round. These days Tam Dao is popular with day-trippers from Hanoi who wish to escape the heat and stress of city life.
